value.name: Listen: Officers call for help during chase that ended with Virginia man shot dead
value.description: U.S. Park Police shot Bijan C. Ghaisar, 25, after a short chase into Fairfax County, Va. on Nov. 17. Ghaisar later died. This audio was edited for brevity.
